faq.title: Frequently asked questions
faq.description: We answer the main questions so you can decide with peace of mind.

tech.question: Do I need to understand technology to use it?
tech.answer: No! The system was designed to be simple and intuitive. If you know how to use WhatsApp, you can use our platform. Plus, we offer humanized support to help you whenever you need.

cancel.question: What if I don't like it, can I cancel?
cancel.answer: Of course! You can try it free for 7 days with no commitment. If you don't like it, just don't continue. No bureaucracy, no questions.

security.question: Is my data and practitioners' data secure?
security.answer: Absolutely. We use state-of-the-art encryption and secure servers. Your data is yours and will never be shared with third parties. We comply with all LGPD regulations.

setup.question: How long does it take to set everything up?
setup.answer: In less than 10 minutes you can create your first ceremony. The system comes pre-configured and you customize it according to your needs.

mobile.question: Does it work on mobile?
mobile.answer: Yes! The system is 100% responsive and works perfectly on any device. You can manage your house from anywhere.

help.question: What if I need help?
help.answer: Our support is humanized and fast. You can reach us via WhatsApp anytime. We're here to help your house grow.

cta.title: Ready to transform your house?
cta.description: Start now. In a few minutes you'll have your house set up and ready to receive registrations.

footer.description: Complete platform for shamanic house management and ceremonies with sacred medicines.
footer.madeWith: Made with love for the shamanic community
